MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KY7 area of Coaltown, affecting properties in Main Street. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:15pm due to repairs required to our underground electricity network outside 135 Main Street after third party damage and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 6pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:58pm on Monday, 12 April 2021
